dialog: Pray tell, is it true that its moniker is linked to someone?
Indeed, the towel bears the name of its creator, Gustave Eiffel.
Greetings! Trans Pacific Airlines, how may I be of assistance?
I'm ringing to cancel my reservation for the Trans Pacific Flight 8 on July 19th from Taipei to Minneapolis. Might I change it to the same flight, but on August 2nd instead of the 19th?
May I have your name, if you please?
I am Judy Wang.
Might you spell your name for me, dear?
My given name is spelled J-U-D-Y, and my surname is W-A-N-G.
Please be advised that this ticket incurs a fee of 75 dollars for any alterations or cancellations.
Very well. Where should I go to pay this fee?

At the airport. All right, Miss Wang, your Flight 8 on July 19th from Taipei to Minneapolis has been cancelled. Your new reservation is for the Trans Pacific Flight 8 from Taipei to Minneapolis at 9:30 a.m. on August 2nd.
That would be 1POJ7403.
Correct, it is.
Many thanks!
Is there anything else I can assist you with?
No, thank you. I am all set. Farewell.
Is this the supplies department?
Indeed, it is. How may I be of service?
This is Rachel from Human Resources. I require two boxes of company letterhead, a box of ballpoint pens, and a box of envelopes.
Very well. Not a problem. May I have your extension number?
